My Projects

Central Market

https://centralmarket.com/

Texas Grocery store chain. The website is a custom designed site that includes user accounts, online ordering, recipes, catering orders, cooking lesson scheduling, and custom holiday pages.

Precept Ministries

https://www.precept.org/

Ministry website. A custom designed site with an E-commerce shop, events system, and general information about the ministry and its service.

Rx Ohio Collaborative

http://rxoc.org/

Ohio State program for improving value in prescription drug use by driving down the cost of drugs. The website includes a membership signup system.

Ohio Library Council

http://olc.org/

The Ohio Library Council is the statewide professional association which represents the interests of Ohio’s public libraries, their trustees, Friends, and staffs.

International Living

https://internationalliving.com/

An online magazine helping retirees that move to foreign countries. The website includes a members-only section with a membership system.

Commonhouse Ales

http://commonhouseales.com/

A craft beer brewery. This website includes an events system.
